WorkflowInfo.Name: Add user to Active Directory group upon email request
WorkflowInfo.Description: Add user to Active Directory group upon email request
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:Split;Assembly=Split, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ADUserExists;Assembly=ADUserExists, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ADGroupExists;Assembly=ADGroupExists, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:Terminate;Assembly=Terminate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ADAddToGroup;Assembly=ADAddToGroup, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:Split IsValid="True" x:Name="split1" SelectedKey="Space" TheValue="%subject%" DisplayName="Split" SelectionType="2" Description="Returns a zero-based, one-dimensional array containing a specified number of substrings." TheValue2="" TypeName="Split" /> <ns1:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%split1%" RowNumber="2" ResultSetName="split1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns1:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="GroupName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%split1%" RowNumber="3" ResultSetName="split1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns2:ADUserExists IsValid="True" x:Name="adUserExists1" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-SERVER" DisplayName="AD User Exists" Path="{x:Null}" Password="" Description="Active directory check if user account exists." HostId="40" TypeName="ADUserExists" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:Terminate DisplayName="Terminate" x:Name="terminate1" TerminationReason="no such user in AD" IsValid="True" TypeName="Terminate" Description="Terminate the current branch in workflow" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> <ns3:ADGroupExists IsValid="True" x:Name="adGroupExists1" ADUserName="%GroupName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-SERVER" DisplayName="AD Group Exists" Path="{x:Null}" Password="" Description="Active directory check if group exists." HostId="40" TypeName="ADGroupExists" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue2" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:Terminate DisplayName="Terminate" x:Name="terminate2" TerminationReason="no such group in AD" IsValid="True" TypeName="Terminate" Description="Terminate the current branch in workflow" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="1800" Subject="Do you approve to add user %UserName% to group %GroupName%?" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:30:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.18106"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>Do you approve to add user %UserName% to group %GroupName%?<BR><BR>Reply yes 
to approve</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity3"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity5"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue5" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","Yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns8:ADAddToGroup ADGroupName="%GroupName%" IsValid="True" x:Name="adAddToGroup1" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-SERVER" DisplayName="AD Add to Group" Path="{x:Null}" Password="" Description="Active directory add to group." HostId="40" TypeName="ADAddToGroup" UserName="" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="User %UserName% has been added to group %GroupName%? successfully" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail2" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="%source%" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.18106"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>User %UserName% has been added to group %GroupName%? 
successfully</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity6"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue6" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="The system administartor didnt approve to add %UserName% to group %GroupName%" DestinationNumber="0" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail3" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="%source%" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.18106"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>The system administartor didnt approve to add %UserName% to group 
%GroupName%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="%source%" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
